comment: * Interface definition for a callback that receives information about DRM framework errors.

methods.name: public void onError(DrmManagerClient client, DrmErrorEvent event)
methods.comment: * Called when the DRM framework sends error information. * * @param client The DrmManagerClient instance. * @param event The {@link DrmErrorEvent} instance that wraps the error type and message.

methodNames: public void onError(DrmManagerClient client, DrmErrorEvent event)
